get.summary: Gets X forecasts on a specific pair for the Binance exchange, given a specific cut-off time

parameters.name: pair_name
parameters.description: The pair name that matches that of the Binance exchange for which to forecast. This value is case-insensitive and the underscore is optional.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: The window period for the candlestick lengths. Currently only 1h is supported.
The max cutoff time for market data to use. This allows for excluding future data when performing tasks like back-testing.
parameters.name: cutoff_time_utc

parameters.description: The number of forecasts to make. These forecasts will be the same window size as the period.
parameters.name: n_forecasts

info.title: Bifröst API
info.description: FrostAura Bifröst is a platform for making forecasts.

tags.name: api/v1/binance
tags.description: A collection of use-cases for Binance market data.

pairName.description: The pair name used on Binance to fetch market data.

timestamp_utc.description: The time for which this forecast is applicable.

close.description: The forecasted closing price of the asset.
